channel.title: Comments on: White Bread Roll with Dutch Crunch Topping – Daring Bakers Challenge March 2012

item.title: By: Lisa
item.dc:creator: Lisa
item.description: wow, that sandwich looks amazing, thank you for sharing ! =D
item.content:encoded: wow, that sandwich looks amazing, thank you for sharing ! =D

item.title: By: Sara C.
item.dc:creator: Sara C.
item.description: Now that is my kind of sandwich! Looks delicious and interesting. Thanks for joining us this month!
item.content:encoded: Now that is my kind of sandwich! Looks delicious and interesting. Thanks for joining us this month!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Your sandwich looks incredible! Excellent job on the bread, it has gorgeous coloring.
item.content:encoded: Your sandwich looks incredible! Excellent job on the bread, it has gorgeous coloring.

item.title: By: thelittleloaf
item.dc:creator: thelittleloaf
item.description: I've read a couple of these posts now and REALLY want to make dutch crunch bread - it looks so good! Love the sandwich you made out of it too - such delicious flavours.
item.content:encoded: I’ve read a couple of these posts now and REALLY want to make dutch crunch bread – it looks so good! Love the sandwich you made out of it too – such delicious flavours.

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great job! Your Dutch Crunch looks awesome, and the sandwich you made sounds delicious!
item.content:encoded: Great job! Your Dutch Crunch looks awesome, and the sandwich you made sounds delicious!
